underlying_goal: Implement spec-14 (infographic structured output with platform-based agent restructure) across three repos using a multi-agent teammate workflow
friction_detail: One agent worker hit context limit and became stuck in idle loop requiring respawn; unnecessary prompt-engineering skill assigned to agents-worker; team cleanup failed due to stale registration.
brief_summary: User handed over a spec for infographic structured output across 3 repos, Claude orchestrated a 3-worker agent team to complete all 15 tasks successfully despite one worker hitting context limits requiring respawn.
